ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | iscld.1 | |- X = U. J |
| 2 |  | #P_difss | |- ( X \ S ) C_ X |
| 3 | 1 | #P_iscld2 | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ ( X \ S ) C_ X ) -> ( ( X \ S ) e. ( Clsd ` J ) <-> ( X \ ( X \ S ) ) e. J ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( J e. Top -> ( ( X \ S ) e. ( Clsd ` J ) <-> ( X \ ( X \ S ) ) e. J ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_dfss4 | |- ( S C_ X <-> ( X \ ( X \ S ) ) = S ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_biimpi | |- ( S C_ X -> ( X \ ( X \ S ) ) = S ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( S C_ X -> ( ( X \ ( X \ S ) ) e. J <-> S e. J ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_sylan9bb | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ S C_ X ) -> ( ( X \ S ) e. ( Clsd ` J ) <-> S e. J ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_bicomd | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ S C_ X ) -> ( S e. J <-> ( X \ S ) e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) ) |
